text: There's a great enthusiasm for good country music all over the world.
author: Willie Nelson

text: I maintain that when I finally retire from my career in music, I will go and live back in Wales - when I am an old person, if I live to be an old person. The water I miss, and the air, there's something different about it. And I miss the simple life.
author: Ellie Goulding

text: I think Ray Charles did as much as anybody when he did his country music album. Ray Charles broke down borders and showed the similarities between country music and R&ampB.
author: Willie Nelson

text: I've always said that Adele has turned so many people on to British singers - whether female singers or just like music from this country in general.
author: Ellie Goulding

text: We used to play music for fun. Much more than now. Now nobody picks up a guitar unless they're paid for it.
author: Leonard Cohen
